scenario_text.value: Hey, Takuma, have you seen Labramon?
No. What’s wrong? She’s always with you.

Right? That’s why I was getting worried. She
was right here just a minute ago...
Then she couldn’t have gone far.
Right! I bet you’ll find her in no time.

Anyway, I’m sure you don’t have to worry.
Labramon’s a lot tougher than you or me.

...I guess that’s true. Thank you, Takuma,
and Agumon.

I’d hate to miss Labramon if she comes back.
I think I’ll wait here for a while.
